entry.title: RE : Visualizations of Votes
entry.summary: The author of the given context wishes to see a visualization that depicts the percentage of votes for various proposals like BIP 100, BIP 101, 8MB and BIP sipa, based on what is published in blocks. The author expresses willingness to display the pie chart on BIPxDevs if such a vote existed. However, there is no standard way for miners to informally vote for the BIPs they support, which makes it difficult to create the desired visualization.
